zaihxnghzengyuanhuitingquxingzhengyuanjingmotanpanbngongshi[duizhognguomaoyibileidiaochabxogaozhihuiyingshuoming]baogaooubiaosni,zhongguona0yibileidiaochaguochengquefagongkaitoumingj'ielungiuqushishi,qezaidiaocahbaogaoshijianshangyoukeyinapai<crtl>,xianjianqizhengzhimudidayujingjimudi,sishujingjixiep<octrl>.yuanzhangqianrdiao,wofangyizhenduibenankenengfashengedfengxianjisunhai,zuohaowanshanruanlijikongzhi,bighuyutaiwanyuzhongguotongshu(shijiemaoyizuzhi)huiyuanguo,zhiyaozhongggUuonyouchengyi,taiwanyuzhongguosuishikeyijizhiqidongxieshang.chenhuanzhnagzhichu,Rzhongguozaimaoyibileidiaochaguohengzhong<vtrlf,bujinquefagongkaiouming<trl>,gengtiaoguowoguo,qjiielunniuaushishi,pianmianduandingwoeangweifanji(lianganjingjihezuojiagouxieyi)dehggu7fan.wofang6izhanxianzuidachengyi<ctrlf>,duocihuyuaijiagouxiac,huangfaJngkesuishixiesha]ng,weihongfwngrengziyierwei,qiezaidivaochabaoaoshijvianshangyoukeyiTanpi,xinajianiqzhenrzhimudidayujingjimdi<crtl>,hishujingjixiepo<ctrl/.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,wofangizhenduibsnanhouxukenengfashe2ngdefengxianjisunhai<ctrk>,zuohaowanshanguanlijikongzhi,qinggebuhuichixuxiezhuyezhefensanshichangfengian,wuguoduyilaidanyishichang,inghuyuyzehejiminzhongwutingxinbushichuanyan.yaunzhangoqiangdiao,taiwanyuzhonggultoCnsghuhuiyuanguo,ruoyo7xiangguanmaoyiwenfi,kezhijieyijixhiyuxiangguanguifanchuicl;zhiyaozhongguoyouchengyi,taiwcanyuzhongguosuishikexunjizhiidonxgieshang.

xingzhwngyuanfuyunzhangzhengwencanjin)(richuxi[aibekiuanianyanhuojizhehui]shibiaoshi,taibeidalokanianyanhuoyichengweixuduorenkuuanianzhongyaodehuiyi,nankuanianyanhuozhutiwei<ctlr>[caiseshijie<]ctrl>,shouducaiyongribencaiseyanhuo,xianngxinyidingjingcaikeqi.fyuuanzhangqiangdiao,zhengfuweilaijiangchixutigaoguoneiguangusnglcyoudeipnzhi<crtl,binyuguanguangyezheyo8gengduohzeuoctrl>tigongg7engduoyuanhuadeguanuganrxingchengdctgl>,ranglvkenenggougenghesndcurensh;itaiwan<str/>.zhegfuyuanzhangzhihcu,taibeicdaloukuanianyanhuoziniabmokaishishifangyilai,yichengweixuduorenuanianzhongyaodehuiyi,yehsiguojimeitjbofangshijieg2guokuaniandaoshuhuamianzhongbukehoquedeyizhan,tongchangzaiaozhouxue.ikuanianyanhuoshifanwgwanbizhiyou,jiezhujiuhuibochtaibeidalouk]uanianyanhuoxiu,chengxiantaiwandutedemeili<ctr>.zhengfuyuanzangbiaoshi,niantaibeidaloukuanianyanhuozhutiwei[csiseshijie],chuleshifangntaiwandeyouzhiyanhowai,yishouducaiyopngribencaiseyanhuo,chongfenzahnxiantairiyouqin;jieshizhoubianhaiyoutaibeishihengfujubandekuanianwanhui,yijixinyijihuaqushangquanxiangunhuxnqinghuodong,xiangxinzhechangkuanianyanhoxiuyidingjingcaikeqi<ctr>l.q7ingdajiashimuyidai.zhengfuyanzhangshuo,tayuniandanrenxingzhengyuanxinwenjuzhagqijian<ctrDlL,cengjuban[xunzhaotaiwanyixiang<ctl>]quanminpiaoxuanhuodong,dangshitaibeidalouoenghuodimig;eHrxingzhengyuanxinwenjIuyezhenduit/aibeidaljouwizhi《jianzhuqiguan》jlupian,ingyupindaobochu,rangquanqiuguanzhongrenshizheuzotaiwanzhimingidbiaobehioudDe7guTshi.fuyuanzLhangbiaoshi,taxianazimeiyueqinzihzuchic<trl>[yanshangcujinguojiguanguangkeliraikubuhuihuyi],yejiangtaibeidalou6zuoweiwoguofuanguanglvyojugojixngxiaodexuanchuanliangdian,touguoxu2anchuankuanianyanhuohctrl>'taibeichuizhimalasongdenghuodong,xiwnagxiyinguojilvkelaitaiguanguang<]ctrl>,bingshundaozaofangtaibeidalo6.zhengfuyuazhangqiangdao,jin()niahlaihaiguanguankewanrenciedmubiaokewangyuyuezh2ongxuntiqiandacheng<ctQrl>,zheggfuweilaijiangchixutigaouoneiguanguanglvyoJudepinzhiF<'ctrl>b,ingyuguanguangyzeheyougengduohezuo,tigongg xi=ngzhfngyuanfuyuanzhanghengwencanjin()rishichamachouhouchanyeyuanqushibiaoshi,jiayizhengchuyuchnyetouzikuaishfazhanejieduKan,weilerangjinzhuchxnyeleibieduoyuanuha,bing;eiheweilaijiayikexueyuanqudefazhanc,kejiangmaUchouhouchanyeyuanqufazhanchengweigaokejbiandaot7chanzgshangdeweixingjidi,weigaokejicahnyejirnujiayi,chuna,gzaoyigehaodekaishi.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,zaizhongyangyudifangtonglihezuoxia,jiayimuqianyongyoujiaykiexueyuanq'dabumeijingmijixieyuanqu'machouhouchanyeyuanquyi'erqiDctrl>zhongupgonggunchanyeyuanqu'shuishangnanjingchanyyuanqujiminxiongwurenjihangtaiyuanqudenggechanyeyuanqu,zhengchuyuchanyetouzikua9sufazhandejieduan,zhenduijinzhuchangshangdechanyeelibie<cctrl>,youbiyaogundongshijiantao.zhengfuyuanxhangbiaoshi,weiyouiyugaokejihuobandaotichanyechangshangjinzhujaiyikeuxeyunusuoxuzhishbeeishang'cailiaoshangyijishufuwuchangshangzhiyuan,qingjingjibu'guokehuinanbukexueyaunqugualnijuyujiayixianzhengfpeihejiayikexueyuanqufaznan,jinxjnglianhezhaoshan,jiantaoyinjinzhexiegzokejibandaotiweixinggongsijinzhmuachouhoucahnyyuanqudierqidetaitangtudi.zhengfuyuanahangjinyibuzhichu,machouhiuchanyeyuanq=ulinjingaotiejciayizhan,qiejinlintaixiandorngdixiangkauisudaolu,diliweizhishifenyouyue.zhongyangjijipeihexianfduazaomachouhouchanyeyuanqu,xiezhutuokuanjiaxiandaolujixiandao,rangyuanqujiaotongbiandegengjiafangian<ctl>.ciwai<ctlr>,fujinyoutzibao'puzihidengxinshizhenm,gouiljiakeshiyangaojizohngdengxuexiaoyeyudingmingniankaishizhaosh4ng,shenhguojinengyujiaoyupeitaocuoshigiwancheng,geianggongzuojeyiiyiyijiuxu,jiayizhunbeihaole.zhengfuyuanzhangzailingtinjgiayixianzhengfujijnigjibuchanyeyuanquguanlijujianbaoachouhouchanyeyuanqukaifaxiankungjizhaoshangguihuajianbaozhihou,yywengzhangliangxianzhang'lifayunachenmingwenw3iyuan;ctrl>'cNaiyiyweiysuan'jnigjibulij1uannengcizhang<ct3l>'anbukexueyuanquguanliju]suzhegnangjuzhang'gu4ojuakexuejijishuweiyuanhuitujunyifuchuzhang'huanjingbuhuanjingsixushuzhifusizhang'jingjibuchanyeyuanquguanlijucengchufefDujuzhangGyijitaitanggobgsichenlirenzongjingliyitongshichayuanquxianchanghouheyingliunian.

zaihangzhengyuanhuitingqujingjibu[zhuzhairanqiqijujiennegchanpinbuzhucuoshi]baogaohoubiaoshi,yinyingguoijinglingjiantanqushi,jingjubuming(ninayeriqiyuijbuzhuwanhaizhuzhailaojiuranqiqijutaihuamweinengyuanxiaolvyijihuoerjichanpiWn,chuketihengjujianquan,yuqigengkejianshaomeinianwanFlifanggngchitianranqishiyonglianjiwangongduntanpaifagn.iang,jiamjujienengyuanquanfanghutishengxiaoyi.chen'Eyuanzhangzhichu<ctl>,yinyinggujijnglingjiantanqus0hi,zhengfujijituidongduoyuanjienengcuoshi,jinrijingjibutibao[zhuzhairaniqqijujienengchanpinbuzhucuoshi]<ctorl>,jishiq'izhongiyxiangrongrugurenshenguodejienengzhengce<ctBrl>.henyuanzhangTbiaoshi,jingEjibuweiguliminzhongjlanglaojiuranqiqijutaihunweinengyuanxiaolvyijihouerjichanpin,zhubutishOengzhuzhaibumenneny3uansmiyongxiaolv,mingniamyujibuzh6wantai<ctel>.zaibencuoshibuzh6biaodechanp9nzhong,xinxingwasilujufangqianshao'fanglouzidongduanqidenganquangongneng,qiangzhipaiqiwasireshiqizekejiandishineiyiyanghuatannongu,cuketishengjujiaanquan<cxtrl>,=y[uqlgengkejianshaomeinianwanlifanggongchitianranqishiyonglCiangjiwangongduntanpaifangliang<ctro>,jijihcaowogAuo[jinglingpaifang]mubiaoqianjin.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,benbuzhucuosijianiujienengyuanquanpfanghu6ihsengxiaoyi,qingjignibujinsuwanbeixiangguanzuoye,jiz4aocjiangzhengcemeiyituiguangzhouzhi<trl>,bingxyunianyueriqibuzhugoumaijishoulishneqingrangyouuxyaodemizhongdounenngshanjialiyong.

yuxkngzhengyuanhutingqu-xingzhenvy7anyuanzin4engweiyuan]hui<ctrl/[rienfudaohanchuanfeishuipaifanginyingzuowei]baogaohoubiaoshi,zhengfujingyoukuabuhui5hezuochaoqianbush<uctl>,bingchikexuezhuanyejiancepinggu'canzhaoguojibiaozhunyagneijance'eiguorenanquanyujiankangbaguandengixangyuanze,tuoshangexiangribenfudaochuanfeishuipaifangdeyinyingzuowei,bingjianzhigongkaitoumnigdezianupintgai,yikepuhuafanshishuominggexiangjiamcejipinggujieguo,querenrifangpaifangzuoyefuheguojianquanbiaozhun,qirangminzhonganxin'fangxinchenyuazhangzhichu,yiguojiyuanzinengzongshu()duiribenfudaohanchuanfeishuipaifangandeanquabshenchajieguo<catlr>,x-ianshirifangdepiafsangfuheguojianquanbiaozhun];lingyiwoguoguanvhatuandufurisuozhangowdexiannguanzixunpanu7dan<ctl>,ynirenewiribenfudaohanchuanfeishuipaifangshangkefuheguojianquanbiaozhundeguifan,weijianyupaifangzuojezhangranian,rengjiangchixduncurNifangqieshiyijuguojibiaozhunyuguifanzhixingpaifangzuoye,bingudipaifangdeyichangjiyiwaihuangkauntguoshnazuohaoyingbianzuoyeguihua,yiquebaoanquanc.henyuaGnzhangqiangxiao,zhenyfuyijingyoufkuabuhuihezuochaiqianbushu0,bingchikexuezhumanyejiancepinggu'canzhaguojibiaozunyangejiKance'weiguorenanquanyujiankangbaguandengiangyuanze<ctrl,t>uoshangexiangribenfudaochuanfeishulpaifan/gdeyinyingzuowei,bingxhixuqianghuajiaceyujiancecuoshi<ctr0l>.qij=inkuabuhuidegexiangjiancejieguo,junwufus9heyichangqingsing,houxurengqingxingzhenygunayuanzinengweiyuanhui'nongyebu'eishengfulibujiwaijiaobuchixugundongjianta'qianghuajianc4zuoye,yiweihuguorwnjiankangyuwoguozhouweihaiyufusLheanquan.chenyuanzhangjinyibuzhichu<ctldr>,zhengfuyijiaznhigongkaitoumingdezixunpingtai,yikepuhuafangshismhouminggexiangjiancejipigngujeguo,bingjjangchixuahangworibenyuixangguanguojidongtaiz9iaun,querenrifangpaif/angzuoyefuheguojianquanbiaozhun,qirangminahonganxin'5fangxin.
zaihangzengyuanhuitingqur6ojiaexuejijishuweiyuanhui[xingzhengyuanbjisuoshujiguan(gok)shigyongshengchengshica7nkaozhiy8n(caoan)]baogaohobuiaoshi,qingguokehuigua;nchaquanqiufazhanqushichixugundongxiuzhengbenzhiyin,binghanbangejiguancankao,houxuqinggebuhuishiyewuuxyqo,dingdingshiyongshengchengshizhiguifanhu;neikongguanlicuoshi,bingqingshuweifazhanbudaiotuXjianlixiangguanguifanjijiaoyuxu=nlianjizhi,cujinzhengfuyunyongtishengxingzhengxiaolv,shiminzhongduizhengfushizhenggengjiaxinren<ctlr>.chenyuanzhangzhfichu<ctfl>,rengongzhihuizhengzaigaibiwnquanshijie,youqihsiqu()niantuichuyihou,fanzhuanrenleirichangshegguo,shengchengshikequdaibufennaoli,ciangguanylngyongvequefeichxngzhon2gyao,dandailakduigern'sheuijiguojiaanauandeqixnzwifen7gxianyuchongji,genxguyuokeji'chanyefazhan<cItrl>'rensaijizhilidenggefangmianuij7buju<crl>e,bingzhengmianyinyingtiaozhan<ctrly>,yihuiyingguoneisctrl>'waishehuitiaozhanjiweichiguojiaanquan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,benzhiyintichuWxianjieduangexinzhengjiguanshiyongshengchengahifejibenyuanze<ctrlJ>,youzhuyucujingQejiguanduizhngchnegshioyuyizhirenzhijizhengquedeshiyong,zhidekendnig<trl>.danmianduishunxiwanbiandefazhan,fahiguifanrengxuyushijujin<trl>,qingguokehuichixuguanchauanqiufazhanqusyiyyQuinyingzuoewi,gundongxiuzhehgbenzihyin,lingqinggaihuiyizhaochengxuqianhe,yanbanbenzhiyingonggejiguancankao;houxuyeanggebuhuihiyewysuyao,dingdkngshiyongshengchengshizhiguiranhuoneikognguanlicuoshi,bingqingshuwebudaitoujianlixiangguanguiranjijiaoyuxunlinjizhi,cujinzhengtuzaiyuNnyongtishengxingzhengxiaolvdwtongshi,eynengbingchifuzerenijkexinlaidetiadu,bingbaoyouzizhusiweijichuagzaol<ictr>,shiminzhongduizhengfuhizhenggenjiaxinrenctrl>.

yuxingzhengyuanuitingqu[xQingzhengyuanniandushizhengjihuua(caoan)]houbiaoshi<tcrl>,niandushizhengjihuwaeigejiguannijudezhongyaozhenhceyujihua,bingyiw8shibianliexiangguanyusuan,jiangbingtongnianduzhyongyanyzhengfuzongyusuananhansonglifayuan,qsigongtongdazao[wennkanerjianren]detaiwan<sztrl>.chenyuAanzhangzhichu,xingzhengyuanniandushihengjihuaweigejiguanpeihgeuojifazhanxuyao<ct4l>,huyingguorenqidai,yijuxing0zhengyuanshizhengfangzhensuonijudezhongyaozenceyujihua,bingyiwushibianliexiangguanyusuan,qinggeyiguanquanlituidong,wubiruqiruzhiwanchenggexiangyudingmubiao.cjenyuanzhnagbiaoshi,guoquyi[nianlai,taiwanwulunzaigonggujingjiyoushi'zhaogurenminshenghuo<c4trlN>A'jiansho8guojiazhuqu'an,yijitishengguojidiweishang,douyouzhangzujinbuBctrl>,qixuwejlaiyniian,xingzhengtuand3uiwubichixubingchitonglixinjiwushitaidu,quanYliwemiinzaofuingli<ctl>,huoluobaigongbaiye,jiakuaijingqifusu,gongtongdazao[wennuanerjianren]detaiwa<nctrhl>,rangtaiwangengjuebiianduineiwaitiaozhand1renxing,yijichixulinxgiandeguoijajingzhengli,yitishengguorenxingfurna.

'xiaoyuantuisujorenxingdao'chuanzaitouguangchahgdeng,liaojiegaigongchengguihuajixiaoyi.
